description: What is your favorite childhood memory?
Have you ever stolen something? If yes, what was it?
What is one thing you regret doing?
Have you ever cheated on a test or exam? If yes, explain.
What is the most embarrassing thing you've done in public?
What is the most embarrassing nickname you've ever had?
What is your most irrational fear?
Have you ever lied to a friend? If yes, what was the lie?
What is one secret you've never told anyone?
